channel.title: ServerStatus Page Help
channel.description:
why is it stuck at 30 minutes and wont decrease?
[code]st updated 0 minutes ago, next update in 30 minutes. Click here to register your own server. This keeps servers in the database until their uptime drops below 40%.[/code]

item.title: ServerStatus Page Help
item.dc:creator: @labeeb labeeb
item.description:
@labeeb wrote:

umm.

actually its a bot that runs every 30 minutes, it connects to ur server. if its sucsess it posts it as 100% to begin with. if not, then it wont post it.

But this bot isnt decreasing its 30 minute time, its only staying at 30minutes. whats up with that?

Read full topic
